# Search Repo 
## Finds the most relevant repo in the command line
[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/search-repo.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/search-repo) [![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/search-repo)](https://pepy.tech/project/search-repo) [![Code style: black](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg)](https://github.com/psf/black)
---

### Installation 
```sh
pip install search_repo
```

### Usage
```bash
# Returns the link to clone the repo
$ search_repo cppcoro
git@github.com:lewissbaker/cppcoro

# Easily used with git clone!
$ git clone $(search_repo cppcoro)
```
